Question
========

Tested is H~0~: p = 0.4 against H~A~: p ≥ 0.4 in a sample of n = 10 observations. Test size is the binomially distributed stochast B, the number of successes in the sample. When the right critical limit r = 7 is used, the significance level α is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.002
* 0.022
* 0.045

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.002: Incorrect
* 0.022: Incorrect
* 0.045: Correct
